entry.title: Enviromor - Multi-Purpose Cleaner & Descaler (946mL)
entry.summary:
Vendor: AVMOR
Type: descaler
Price: 8.53

Safe product, acid and biodegradable, without steam harmful and non-corrosive on the skin. Cleans deposits limestones. Removes effectively: rust, tarnish, calcium, soap residue, mold, grease, milkstone, etc. Safe for most metal surfaces. It is recommended to test the product on an inconspicuous area before using.

Safe and biodegradable product Without harmful vapor Non-corrosive on the skin Removes effectively: rust, tarnish, calcium, soap scum, mildew, grease, milkstone, etc.

  • Safety acidic product that is biodegradable, non-fuming and non-corrosive on mild steel and skin
  • Cleans and revitalize washable surfaces including plastic, laminated, copper, steel, ceramic, tile, porcelain, painted surfaces, brass and grout
  • Does not pit, streak or blacken metals
  • For use in a variety of facilities including restaurants, commercial buildings, restrooms, manufacturing plants, sports and recreational areas, as well as educational institutions
  • Removes surface & heavy rust, tarnish, calcium, lime, soap scum, mold and mildew, grease, beer stone, milk stone, scuff marks and other heavy soils
  • Accepted for use in Canadian food processing facilities
  • Certified UL Ecologo® 2759

Container Type Jug
Container Size 4L

entry.title: Biomor - Odour Eliminator (3.78L)
entry.summary:
Vendor: AVMOR
Type: deoderizer
Price: 95.96

Biomor Odour Eliminator is a fast acting and effective biological product that neutralizes odour causing molecules upon contact. To be used on carpets, upholstery, textiles, curtains and other types of fabrics and hard surfaces, and in areas such as compost bins, garbage collection areas and gym lockers. It attacks odours such as urine, smoke, vomit, perspiration, food waste, and other unpleasant smells.
Dilution   1:10 and 1:32
Format 1.89L
Trigger Included
